title.rendered: Preschool to Kindergarten Special Education Meeting Recording

content.rendered: The Pupil Services Department shared information regarding the transition from Pre-School to School-Age Special Education services on January 18.  Watch the presentation.

excerpt.rendered: The Pupil Services Department shared information regarding the transition from Pre-School to School-Age Special Education services on January 18.  Watch the presentation.
